```{r}
library(here)

library(dplyr)
```

# Q1 Load data
```{r}
courses <- vroom(here("data","courses.csv"))
```


# Q2 Formatted table

```{r}
courses |>
  arrange(courses) |>
  kable(
    caption = "List of courses",
    align   = "l"
  )
```
